materials.raw_text: Co: 60 g, Er: 132 g, Tb: 12 g

sourcing.instructions: Co: Purchase from a chemical supplier or online marketplace; Er: Rare earth metal suppliers; Tb: Rare earth metal suppliers.
steps: Co: Purchase from a chemical supplier or online marketplace; Er: Rare earth metal suppliers; Tb: Rare earth metal suppliers.
1. Weigh out 60 g of cobalt (Co), 132 g of erbium (Er), and 12 g of terbium (Tb).
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out 60 g of cobalt (Co), 132 g of erbium (Er), and 12 g of terbium (Tb).

steps: 1. Transfer the mixed powders into a high-temperature furnace or muffle furnace.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixed powders into a high-temperature furnace or muffle furnace.

steps: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the furnace and carefully break it into smaller pieces if necessary.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the furnace and carefully break it into smaller pieces if necessary.
